Academic: A cell photographed through a microscope. DNA in the nucleus, the Golgi apparatus, and the actin filament cytoskeleton are shown.

Everything we see around us is matter! 
Matter comes in 3 main states: solids, liquids & gases.
Can you explain the differences between these states by looking at 1st Year models? 🧊💧💨
